mapper.insert: INSERT INTO resume ( user_id, stage_name, gender, birth, sns, phone_number, area, instrument, genre, practice_date, practice_time, detail_time, band_career, band_name, band_period, note ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{stageName}, #{gender}, #{birth}, #{sns}, #{phoneNumber}, #{area}, #{instrument}, #{genre}, #{practiceDate}, #{practiceTime}, #{detailTime}, #{bandCareer}, #{bandName}, #{bandPeriod}, #{note} )
